ValidationRule.description: If Customer Status is Red, then Reason for not working with SC is mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF( CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Validation"),FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), ISPICKVAL( Customer_Status__c,"Red"), ISPICKVAL( Reasons_For_Not_Working_With_SC__c , ""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a reason for low/no activity from this customer in the last year.
